name: Knight Arena (itch)
description:
Little Knight is sick of being a video game character, and wants to escape the arena.

Haxxor the hacker can help you escape. Defeat the creatures and score 500 to win.

WASD to move, left click to attack.

This is an early prototype for another game that I may create in future.

Music:

New Hero In Town by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5742-new-hero-in-town

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Urban Gauntlet by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5012-urban-gauntlet
